name: Project Gonagon
description:
Your goal is to escape the facility of Control Inc., where they are doing... sketchy business. (Like every other semi-abandoned research lab ever) A short puzzle game with Portal-esque gameplay, will you make it out alive?

  • Game created for GMTK2020, in 48 hours.
  • Coding, Levels, SFX, and Textures by Windzyboy
  • Voice Acting and Models by Binks
  • Music by Snowfall2022 and Senatorwhy
    • Original OST with one song

Issues:

  • Camera doesn't fade to black at end
  • VSync is disabled, visuals stutter
  • Hard-to-run on low-end computers
  • Stock image is used
